alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 1:53AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... North Fork Peachtree Creek near Atlanta at Briarwood Road affecting DeKalb County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and expected to continue. * WHERE...North Fork Peachtree Creek Atlanta at Briarwood Road. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:46 AM EST Thursday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:46 AM EST Thursday was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
